```{r}
ggplot(data = agingData,
       aes(x = Race)) +
  geom_bar(color = "black",
           fill = "darkseagreen4") + 
theme_light()
```


```{r}
ggplot(data = agingData,
       aes(x = Gender)) +
  geom_bar(color = "black",
           fill = "darkseagreen4")
```
